Since some of you don't know what you're doing I thought I'd help.

1) Download the GTA:SA game here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3620536/GTA_SA.iso_FULLY_WORKING_NO_SERIAL_NEEDED_
2) Mount GTA SA with Daemon Tools.
3) Download this crack. Protip: Both the game and the crack are named the same so follow directions correctly and in order.
4) After crack is downloaded place file in C:\Program Files\Rockstar Games\GTA San Andreas (Computer > Program files > Rockstar games > GTA San Andreas.) Protip: If you want you can rename your crack file I just named it GTA SA (2), lol. (For lack of confusion)
5) Run crack and enjoy.

I hope this helps.
